channel.title: Generic Host Process for Win32 error causes my comp to shutdown. Wtf is this?
channel.description:
Can someone help me out with this? Every single day around the same time I get this error on my computer and it causes my computer to shutdown. It pops up a window that says a process has unexpectedly ended and the computer must restart and it gives me a 60 seconds before it shuts down. This has been pissing me off for like 2 weeks now and I don't know what the problem is. This causes a problem for my server because the computer keeps shutting off causing the server to shut off (obviously). Here's a picture of the error.
[img]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/7342/generichostbullshit.png[/img]
Has anyone gotten this or know what I can do to stop it? Thanks.

Uhm. Maybe click “Send Error Report”???
